title: House Backs Trump Impeachment Probe, China’s Trade Doubts, Looking at the New Economy
itunes:title: House Backs Trump Impeachment Probe, China’s Trade Doubts, Looking at the New Economy
description:
Bloomberg News Political Reporter Ryan Teague Beckwith and Bloomberg News Legal Analyst June Grasso discuss the U.S. House vote to open hearings on the impeachment of President Trump. Jonathan Goldstein, CEO at Cain International, talks about Brexit’s impact on global real estate. Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan walks through China’s doubts for a long-term trade deal with the U.S. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Global Economics Editor Cristina Lindblad discuss the Bloomberg New Economy issue of Businessweek Magazine. And we Drive to the Close with Leo Kelly, CEO and Co-CIO at Verdence Capital Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
